t: What Was Myhabit.com and Why Was it Discontinued?
s: January 8, 2024 - MyHabit was a membership-only online retail store relying on its flash sales business model. It closed down as the popularity of flash sales started dying down.
April 21, 2016 - The company informed employees in New York Thursday morning that the site would close by the end of May.
